answers.answer: Ok..and there's why you have high blood pressure. Lol ;) deep breath. It will be ok. Even if you have high blood pressure, treatment and monitoring can take care of that. But, not if you are freaking yourself out. No worries until you have to. * hugs*
You're right! Im just freakin out about nothing right now. Deeeeep breath . Lol
They made me drink that nasty stuff too but my blood sugar was ok, I'm sure it was just high cause you're nervous. You'll be ok.  :-)
Mine has been high since week 4 (currently 19), but the Dr and I think it's from nerves, cause I'm high risk for other reasons. So we are not treating it, just watching it
I can find out in a couple days but man Im nervous!

question: My blood pressure was high! She asked about my headaches and is sending me to a neurologist! Im also sitting in the waiting room I just drank a nasty orange drink and theyre already worried about diabetes with me!The biggest thing I was worried about was hearing that Im too fat.... well jeeeez this certainly shut me up lolShe didn't even mention my weight!Im concerned now! Anyone else have this happen to them?
title: update for my first visit to the doctor's
